titles.title: To provide for duty free treatment for certain United States Government property returned to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/17/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain federal property returned to the United States.
